steps.name: New User Setup: Free User Sign up
Create new user data
Free user sign up API call
New User Setup: Free User Email Confirmation via Database
New User Setup: Free User Login
Fill in Email Address
Fill in Password
Click on the Login Button
New User Setup: Upgrade Free User to Business
Click the Settings on the Side Menu
Click on the Billing option in the side menu
Click "Upgrade" button for Business option
Enter card details
Enter card number
Enter expiration date
Enter CVC
Enter Full Name
Enter ZIP
Click "Subscribe" button
Click "No,thanks" button on the One Time Special Offer Modal
A toast message with the text "Plan has been successfully changed." is visible and hidden then
Click "Sign" sidemenu
Click "Team" on the Side Menu
Click on the "Add Team Member" button
Fill in the team member email input field
Fill in the team member name input field
Get team member role value
Click on the "Send Invites" button
Verify that a toast message ‘Invites sent successfully’ popped up
Retrieve the confirmation link from the user's email.
Navigate to the invite link
Click on the "Back to main page" button
A toast message with the text "Invite accepted." is visible and hidden then
Click "Team" on the Side Menu
Verify that a team member has role 'User' set in the Team table
Click on the "Options" button associated with the exact team member
